pr_title: IGNITE-13148 .NET: Add Thin Client Continuous Query

timeline.bodyText: Are you sure we should treat it as a query? I know there is a query word in name, but I'm not sure those mechanisms belong to the same pool.
timeline.author: isapego

replies.bodyText: Good point, I've posted this to the dev list.
replies.author: ptupitsyn

replies.bodyText: No replies on dev list. Let's keep it as is for now. Continuous Query still gives us a QueryCursor, so I think it fits with the other cursors.
replies.author: ptupitsyn

timeline.message: Add separate classes for Thin cont query APIs, do not reuse thick
Use IgniteAsyncCallback on server to notify the client
Use ContinuousQueryClient instead of thick api

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master' into ignite-13148
